column3: If possible, I'd like to include #16639
Concept ACK, haven't checked the translation changes in detail but looks good to me on first glance

Translations for 0.17 cleaned and updated on transifex.
Be advised, some translations were merged. There were also some translations which were just duplicates and didn't add anything when merging them. The result is less language files, which are in turn more complete.

p.s. I'd still like to further tidy up the translation on transifex, but i'm waiting for laanwj's answer. It's a mess with

I've updated this to pull the latest Transifex changes for `0.17`.

> Cleaning up further for 0.17 and 0.18 would only make a bigger mess on transifex since I can't move 0.14, 0.15 and 0.16 versions around.

I'd suggest just concentrating on the upcoming 0.19 release. "Cleaning up" anything more for 0.17 and even 0.18 is going to be low impact

> "Cleaning up" anything more for 0.17 and even 0.18 is going to be low impact\n\nI'm well aware of that, I wasn't going to clean the older translations, just move some of them from locales to languages - since I can't do that, moving languages around can make a mess on transifex. Languages which appeared to be complete (100% translated in every branch) would then be only ~80% translated, even t

>  since I can't move 0.14, 0.15 and 0.16 versions around.\n\nPlease don't spend time on those versions, their translations will never end up in a release anymore. Only the last two major releases have active translation, and I agree with @fanquake that it only makes sense to focus on the latest release (now 0.18, translations will open for 0.19 in a few days) for major changes.
> but i'm waiting for laanwj's answer\n\nSorry, answer to what are you waiting for?

@laanwj sorry if I wasn't clear enough. I'm not spending time on 0.14 - 0.16.
I'd just like to tidy up translations on transifex and move translations from locales to languages ((cs_CZ) to (cs) for example), because we don't need a locale for czech language.
To do this in a clean way, I'd also have to move 0.14-0.16 translations around (or just delete them), which I can't at the moment.

I
I've managed to remove the 0.14-0.16 resources. As for the other questions, see #16754.
Thanks, that removal was accidental, as miniupnpc wasn't available when i compiled the 0.17.2 binaries. Fixed up now.
